record.title: AUTHORIZING THE USE OF EMANCIPATION HALL
record.narrative:
AUTHORIZING THE USE OF EMANCIPATION HALL -- (Senate - November 20, 2008)

[Page: S10771]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of H. Con. Res. 435 received from the House.

record.chair: The clerk will report the concurrent resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

A concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 435) authorizing the use of Emancipation Hall on December 2, 2008, for ceremonies and activities held in connection with the opening of the Capitol Visitor Center to the public.
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the concurrent resolution.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the concurrent resolution be agreed to, the motions to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements related to the concurrent resolution be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 435) was agreed to.
